verses.verse: Surely <S%H3426><s%> there is a mine <S%H4161><s%> for silver <S%H3701><s%>, And a place <S%H4725><s%> for gold <S%H2091><s%> which they refine <S%H2212><s%>.
Iron <S%H1270><s%> is taken <S%H3947><s%> out of the earth <S%H6083><s%>, And copper <S%H5154><s%> is molten <S%H6694><s%> out of the stone <S%H68><s%>.

Man setteth <S%H7760><s%> an end <S%H7093><s%> to darkness <S%H2822><s%>, And searcheth out <S%H2713><s%>, to the furthest bound <S%H8503><s%>, The stones <S%H68><s%> of obscurity <S%H652><s%> and of thick darkness <S%H6757><s%>.

He breaketh open <S%H6555><s%> a shaft <S%H5158><s%> away from where men sojourn <S%H1481><s%>; They are forgotten <S%H7911><s%> of the foot <S%H7272><s%>; They hang <S%H1809><s%> afar <S%H5128><s%> from men <S%H582><s%>, they swing to and fro.
As for the earth <S%H776><s%>, out of it cometh <S%H3318><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>; And underneath it is turned up <S%H2015><s%> as it were by fire <S%H784><s%>.
The stones <S%H68><s%> thereof are the place <S%H4725><s%> of sapphires <S%H5601><s%>, And it hath dust <S%H6083><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>.
That path <S%H5410><s%> no bird <S%H5861><s%> of prey knoweth <S%H3045><s%>, Neither hath the falcon <S%H344><s%>'s eye <S%H5869><s%> seen it <S%H7805><s%>:
The proud <S%H7830><s%> beasts <S%H1121><s%> have not trodden <S%H1869><s%> it <S%H7826><s%>, Nor hath the fierce lion passed thereby <S%H5710><s%>.
He putteth forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the flinty rock <S%H2496><s%>; He overturneth <S%H2015><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> by the roots <S%H8328><s%>.
He cutteth out <S%H1234><s%> channels <S%H2975><s%> among the rocks <S%H6697><s%>; And his eye <S%H5869><s%> seeth <S%H7200><s%> every precious thing <S%H3366><s%>.
He bindeth <S%H2280><s%> the streams <S%H5104><s%> that they trickle <S%H1065><s%> not <S%H8587><s%>; And the thing that is hid bringeth he forth <S%H3318><s%> to light <S%H216><s%>.
But where <S%H370><s%> shall wisdom <S%H2451><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%>? And where is the place <S%H4725><s%> of understanding <S%H998><s%>?
Man <S%H582><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> not the price <S%H6187><s%> thereof <S%H4672><s%>; Neither is it found in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>.
The deep <S%H8415><s%> saith <S%H559><s%>, It is not in me <S%H3220><s%>; And the sea saith <S%H559><s%>, It is not with me.
It cannot be gotten <S%H5414><s%> for gold <S%H5458><s%>, Neither shall silver <S%H3701><s%> be weighed <S%H8254><s%> for the price thereof <S%H4242><s%>.
It cannot be valued <S%H5541><s%> with the gold <S%H3800><s%> of Ophir <S%H211><s%>, With the precious <S%H3368><s%> onyx <S%H7718><s%>, or the sapphire <S%H5601><s%>.
Gold <S%H2091><s%> and glass <S%H2137><s%> cannot equal <S%H6186><s%> it <S%H8545><s%>, Neither shall it be exchanged for jewels <S%H3627><s%> of fine gold <S%H6337><s%>.
No mention <S%H2142><s%> shall be made of coral <S%H7215><s%> or of crystal <S%H1378><s%>: Yea <S%H4901><s%>, the price of wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is above rubies <S%H6443><s%>.
The topaz <S%H6357><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> shall not equal <S%H6186><s%> it <S%H5541><s%>, Neither shall it be valued with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H3800><s%>.
Whence <S%H370><s%> then cometh <S%H935><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>? And where is the place <S%H4725><s%> of understanding <S%H998><s%>?
Seeing it is hid <S%H5956><s%> from the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all living <S%H2416><s%>, And kept close <S%H5641><s%> from the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
Destruction <S%H11><s%> and Death <S%H4194><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, We have heard <S%H8085><s%> a rumor <S%H8088><s%> thereof with our ears <S%H241><s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> understandeth <S%H995><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> thereof <S%H3045><s%>, And he knoweth the place thereof <S%H4725><s%>.
For he looketh <S%H5027><s%> to the ends <S%H7098><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, And seeth <S%H7200><s%> under the whole heaven <S%H8064><s%>;
To make <S%H6213><s%> a weight <S%H4948><s%> for the wind <S%H7307><s%>: Yea <S%H8505><s%>, he meteth out the waters <S%H4325><s%> by measure <S%H4060><s%>.
When he made <S%H6213><s%> a decree <S%H2706><s%> for the rain <S%H4306><s%>, And a way <S%H1870><s%> for the lightning <S%H2385><s%> of the thunder <S%H6963><s%>;
Then did he see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H5608><s%>, and declare it <S%H3559><s%>; He established it <S%H2713><s%>, yea, and searched it out.

And unto man <S%H120><s%> he said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H3374><s%>, the fear of the Lord <S%H136><s%>, that is wisdom <S%H2451><s%>; And to depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%> is understanding <S%H998><s%>.
